metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23856 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Use-after-Free vulnerability in cflow 1.6 in the void call(char *name, intline) function at src/parser.c, which could cause a denial of service viathe pointer variable caller->callee.

criterions.comment: cflow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
